description: This table contains Home Health care plan visit set information entered on the Remote Client. The table contains information about the date ranges that the visit sets are scheduled for as well as their frequency.

columns.name: CAREPLAN_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the care plan.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: VISIT_SET_DISC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Visit set discipline category list.  Links to category table ZC_DISCIPLINE.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: VISIT_SET_DISC_IDX
columns.description: Visit set discipline index.

columns.name: VISITS_PER_PERIOD
columns.description: Visit set visits per period.

columns.name: PERIOD_TIME_UNTS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Period time units (day, week, prn, etc.) for the visit set.  Links to category table ZC_PER_TIME_UNITS.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


PRN


Hour


Day


Week


30 Day Month


Month

columns.name: TIME_UNITS_PER_PRD
columns.description: Visit set time units per period.

columns.name: VISIT_SET_DURATION
columns.description: Visit set duration.

columns.name: VST_SER_DISCHRG_DT
columns.description: Visit series discharge date.

columns.name: VST_SER_CERT_PRD
columns.description: Visit series certification period.

columns.name: VST_FROM_DATE
columns.description: Visit set from date.

columns.name: VST_TO_DATE
columns.description: Visit set to date.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is populated only if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: VSTS_FROM_PER_PRD
columns.description: This item stores the from part of the visits range in the visit set.

columns.name: VS_VERBAL_ORDER_ID
columns.description: The verbal order linked to the visit set for a specific version of that visit set.

columns.name: VISIT_SET_DC_DT
columns.description: This item stores the discontinued date of the visit set, which becomes the effective end date when a visit set is discontinued.

columns.name: VISIT_SET_MOD_LINK
columns.description: The line number of the visit set that this was modified to. The "child" visit set.

columns.name: VISIT_SET_COMMENT_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note record that stores the visit set comments.

columns.name: VS_LAST_EDIT_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when this visit set was last edited.

columns.name: SCHEDULING_INSTR_NOTE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the HNO ID for the visit set scheduling instructions.

columns.name: VISIT_SET_VER
columns.description: The current version of the visit set.

columns.name: VISIT_SET_VER_ON_POC
columns.description: The version of the visit set currently on the patient's Plan of Care.
